title: BRIEF-Xian LONGi Silicon signs sales contracts worth about 1.2 bln yuan
text:
BRIEF-Xian LONGi Silicon signs sales contracts worth about 1.2 bln yuan 
Oct 19 Xian Longi Silicon Materials Corp 
* Says signs sales contracts worth about 1.2 billion yuan ($188.71 million) 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1LxLrcc 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3591 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
